name: DETAR 8
description: DETAR 8 is Peroxide-based liquid detergent specially designed for the removal of particularly difficult food residue in conjunction with an alkaline cycle. Detar 8 is a careful blend of peroxides and sequestering agents designed ing problems deriving from dirt residue that is difficult to remove when using only alkaline treatment. The use of Detar 8 in association with washing with Detar PS develops effective oxidizing action that removes organic residue stuck to walls that would require strong mechanical action.
